title: Lyn Woodward (Kelley Blue Book)
description:
Lyn Woodward is an automotive journalist that has written for all the big mags, traveled the world, and has an amazing story about off-roading. She currently reviews cars for Kelley Blue Book's YouTube channel. 


Check out Lyn's work on the KBB YouTube Channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCj9yUGuMVVdm2DqyvJPUeUQ


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @lyn_woodward
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

NEW SHIRTS!
https://www.blipshift.com/tst

Get the video version of this podcast on our YouTube Channel here: https://youtu.be/Gv_cAGT4M4E
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
